title: Authorizes the court to require a defendant convicted of making graffiti to submit to the use of an electronic monitoring device or 100 hours of community service
summary: Authorizes the court to require a defendant convicted of making graffiti to submit to the use of an electronic monitoring device or complete 100 hours of community service.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of making graffiti
